issue.title: Custom fields for virtual services on linux
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Two custom fields allowedoperationsql and physicalservicesql doesn't load on linux because files associated contains uppercase characters :
allowedoperationSQL.php
physicalserviceSQL.php

We have to rename to : 
allowedoperationsql.php
physicalservicesql.php

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.3
